    • Constructor Detail

      • BlockLoadRequestHandler

        public BlockLoadRequestHandler(SpriteCollection collection,
                               int firstSpriteID)
        Create a new request listener which will finish loading a block of sprites when the request is ready. The handler will release the lock on the collection, so it should already be acquired. The thread that has the lock when this handler is called does not matter.
        Parameters:
        collection - The collection to put the sprites in
        firstSpriteID - The index of the first sprite this handler will be loading

    • Method Detail

      • requestReady

        public void requestReady(CachedFileRegion region)
        Called when the file data for a block of images is ready to be loaded. Creates a BufferedImage for each and places the image into the collection. When all of the images have been placed into the collection, the block's lock is released.
        Specified by:
        requestReady in interface FileRequestListener<CachedFileRegion>
        Parameters:
        region - The object representing the file

      • loadBlock

        private void loadBlock(CachedFileRegion region)
        Helper method for dealing with the request
        Parameters:
        region - The file region containing the image data
